H3.text: when did fortnite save the world first come out. July 25 , 2017

A4.text: Save the World mode achieved over one million players by August 2017, just prior to the release of Battle Royale.

A5.text: The game was initially released as a paid-for early access title for macOS, PlayStation 4, Windows, and Xbox One on July 25, 2017.

A6.text: Epic decided to release the game into paid early access on July 25, 2017, which would also allow them to get active feedback on the game as they progressed in development.
